name: waitron
description: Monster child of callback and semaphore without any promises

scripts.benchmarks: (INFO=1 npm run -s benchmark0holders && npm run -s benchmark5holders && npm run -s benchmark15holders && npm run -s benchmark29holders) > ./reports/benchmarks.txt && (./node_modules/.bin/opener ./reports/benchmarks.txt &)
scripts.checkCoverage: rm -rf ./reports/coverage && c8 --clean --report --reporter text --reporter html --reports-dir reports/coverage node --allow-natives-syntax ./test/index.js && mv ./coverage ./reports/coverage && (./node_modules/.bin/opener ./reports/coverage/index.html &)
scripts.checkMemory: mkdir -p reports && node --expose-gc ./test/memory.js && echo 'heapsnapshots created in ./reports directory'

author: Marcin Konicki <ahwayakchih@neoni.net>
